languages.text: {n}Церемониймейстер с великим почтением кланяется вам.{/n} "Да будет принесена клятва династии фон Валанциус. Повторяйте за мной, Ваша Светлость. Я, {name}, милостью Императора Вольный Торговец, клянусь быть ослепительным примером Человечества..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Церемониймейстер с великим почтением кланяется вам.{/n} "Да будет принесена клятва династии фон Валанциус. Повторяйте за мной, Ваша милость. Я, {name}, милостью Императора Вольный Торговец, клянусь быть ослепительным примером человечества..."

languages.text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."
languages.original_text: {n}Церемониймейстер с великим почтением кланяется вам.{/n} "Да будет принесена клятва династии фон Валанциус. Повторяйте за мной, Ваша Светлость. Я, {name}, милостью Императора Вольный Торговец, клянусь быть ослепительным примером Человечества..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the shining examples of mankind..."

{n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the shining examples of mankind..."

{n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

{n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

{n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

languages.text: {n}式部官は最敬礼の念をこめてあなたにお辞儀をする。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の誓いが行われます。私に続いてご唱和ください、陛下。私、{name}は皇帝の恩寵を受けた自由開拓者として、人類の鑑となることを誓い…」
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}式部官は最敬礼の念をこめてあなたにお辞儀をする。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の誓いが行われます。私に続いてご唱和ください、陛下。私、{name}は皇帝の恩寵を受けた自由開拓者として、人類の鑑となることを誓い…」

languages.text: {n}祭仪大师毕恭毕敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，请以冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的名义宣誓，请随我重复以下誓言——我，{name}，奉神皇恩典成为行商浪人，在此宣誓将成为人类的楷模……”
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}祭仪大师毕恭毕敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“大人，请以冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的名义宣誓，请随我重复以下誓言——我，{name}，奉神皇恩典成为行商浪人，在此宣誓将成为人类的楷模……”

languages.text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias se inclina ante ti con el mayor de los respetos.{/n} «Ha llegado el momento de prestar el juramento de la dinastía von Valancius. Repita conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo, {name}, Comerciante Independiente por la gracia del Emperador, juro ser un ejemplo a seguir para la Humanidad...».
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de ceremonias se inclina ante ti con el mayor de los respetos.{/n} «Ha llegado el momento de prestar el juramento de la dinastía von Valancius. Repita conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo, {name}, Comerciante Independiente por la gracia del Emperador, juro ser un ejemplo a seguir para la Humanidad...».

languages.text: {n}Le maître des cérémonies s'incline avec forte déférence.{/n} « Que le serment de la dynastie von Valancius soit prononcé. Veuillez répéter après moi, Votre Seigneurie. Moi, {name}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} par la grâce de l'Empereur, je jure d'incarner le parangon de l'humanité... »
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître des cérémonies s'incline avec force déférence.{/n} « Que le serment de la dynastie von Valancius soit prononcé. Veuillez répéter après moi, Votre Seigneurie. Moi, {name}, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} par la grâce de l'Empereur, je jure d'incarner le parangon de l'humanité... »

languages.text: {n}Der Zeremonienmeister verbeugt sich ehrerbietig vor dir.{/n} "Möge nun der Eid der Dynastie von Valancius geleistet werden. Bitte sprecht mir nach, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich, {name}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} durch die Gnade des Imperators, schwöre, ein Vorbild der Menschheit zu sein ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Zeremonienmeister verbeugt sich ehrerbietig vor dir.{/n} "Möge nun der Eid der Dynastie von Valancius geleistet werden. Bitte sprecht mir nach, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich, {name}, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} durch die Gnade des Imperators, schwöre, ein Vorbild der Menschheit zu sein ..."

languages.text: {n}Teşrifatçı, önünde büyük bir saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Von Valancius hanedanının yemini edilsin. Lütfen tekrar edin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator'un lütfuyla Hür Tacir addedilen ben, {name}, İnsanlığa emsal olmaya ant içiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}The master of ceremonies bows to you with great reverence.{/n} "Let the oath of the von Valancius dynasty be taken. Please repeat after me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I, {name}, Rogue Trader by the grace of the Emperor, vow to be the paragon of Humanity..."
